question: Write a letter to the restaurant, applying for the job. In your letter:•	explain what you are currently doing•	describe your suitability for this area of work•	say when you can attend an interview
text: I am responding regarding your job advertisement which was published on 24 November in a local newspaper.

Now, I am working as a part-time waiter at the Red Lobster restaurant. I am looking for a full-time job because recently, I have completed my graduation and my current employer have no more hours for me. I pose 2 years of experience in this field and I also hold a food handle safety certificate as well as a liquor server license which is necessary for this job. I have been selected as an employee of the month 10 times last year which shows that I am a responsible and well-disciplined employee.

I am available for an interview next week on 24 and 25 November from 8:00 a.m. to 5 p.m. I have attached copies of my all certificates and work references with this letter. I am requesting you to consider me for this position as I have met all the requirements stated in the advertisement.
I look forward to hearing from you.
